definition: quarter (hour)/moment/to carve/to engrave/to cut/oppressive/classifier for short time intervals

sentences.english: An optical recording system is designed in this paper to record the servo patterns.
sentences.chinese: 本文設計了用於刻寫伺服圖形的光記錄系統。

sentences.english: They are the Buddhist scriptures carved in palm leaves.
sentences.chinese: 就是在那種貝葉棕的葉子上刻寫的佛經啊。

sentences.english: In my grandma's time, secretaries of work units would be able to cut mimeograph stencils.
sentences.chinese: 在奶奶那個年代，單位的文祕都要求會刻寫蠟版呢。

sentences.english: It was already written in the sky, shining with those flaming stars forever.
sentences.chinese: 它已經刻寫在了天空，與星辰一起閃爍。

sentences.english: Writing the design of automatic self-feeding system design from top to bottom.
sentences.chinese: 本設計爲自助刻寫機自動上下料系統設計。

sentences.english: Most books were printed by carving the text on boards, word by word, page by page.
sentences.chinese: 大多數書都要得逐字逐頁的刻寫在板上後，才能印刷。

sentences.english: This is the reason I write the letter to you.
sentences.chinese: 這是我此刻寫此信的原因。

sentences.english: The angel told him where to find golden tablets with the word of God.
sentences.chinese: 天使跟他說去哪裏找到有神諭的黃金刻寫板。
